amendatorysection.para: (1) For purposes of the Building Construction Act, component means a portion of the state building code adopted by reference pursuant to section 71-6403.
(2) The state building code shall be the building and construction standard within the state and shall be applicable:
(a) To all buildings and structures owned by the state or any state agency; and
(b) In each county, city, or village which elects to adopt the state building code or any component or combination of components of the state building code.
